Interface PersonService

    API Service for the collections-related staff.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        PagingResponse<Person> list(PersonSearchRequest searchRequest)
        Deprecated. 
        Pages Person entities based on the parameters received.

        To iterate over all entities you can use code like this: PagingRequest req = new PagingRequest(); PagingResponse<T> response; do { response = service.list(req); for (T obj : response.getResults()) { doStuff(); } req.nextPage(); } while (!response.isEndOfRecords());

        Parameters:
        searchRequest - PersonSearchRequest with all the parameters
        Returns:
        a list of entities ordered by their creation date, newest coming first

      • listDeleted

        PagingResponse<Person> listDeleted(@Nullable
                                   Pageable page)
        Deprecated. 
        Provides access to deleted persons.

      • suggest

        List<PersonSuggestResult> suggest(@Nullable
                                  String q)
        Deprecated. 
        Provides a simple suggest service.
